content: BRASILIA Brazilian prosecutors plan to investigate last year's controversial sale of the Argentine subsidiary of Petrobras  Brazil's state-controlled oil company  a lawyer representing some Petrobras shareholders said on Wednesday.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Petrobras Argentina sale under scrutiny in Brazil

content: NEW YORK  Jan 17 (IFR) - Argentina's Pampa Energia (B3/B-/B+) launched a debut 10-year non-call five bond amid strong demand Tuesday  getting ahead of the government's multi-billion dollar trade later in the week.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Argentina's Pampa makes bond debut amid strong demand

content: NEW YORK  Aug 1 (IFR) - Argentine energy company Pampa Energia is aiming to issue bonds early next year once it fully completes its merger with Petrobras Argentina  a company source told IFR on Monday.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Pampa Energia eyes next year for bond take-out

content: BUENOS AIRES Argentine utilities company Pampa Energia said on Tuesday it had sold its indirect stake in local natural gas supplier Transportadora de Gas del Sur (TGS) for $241 million.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Argentina's Pampa Energia sells TGS gas stake in $241 million deal

content: BUENOS AIRES  July 19 Argentine utilities company Pampa Energia said on Tuesday it had sold its indirect stake in local natural gas supplier Transportadora de Gas del Sur (TGS) for $241 million.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Argentina's Pampa Energia sells TGS gas stake in $241 mln deal

content: NEW YORK  June 24 (IFR) - Argentine power company Pampa Energia will hire four banks to lead a new international bond sale that will refinance debt taken out to fund its acquisition of Petrobras's Argentine assets.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Pampa Energia to hire four banks for new bond sale

content: BUENOS AIRES  May 12 Argentina's Pampa Energia SA said on Thursday it planned to invest $400 million in thermal and wind energy projects if it wins a tender process for renewable power projects that the government will hold next week.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Argentina's Pampa Energia aims to invest $400 mln in renewable energy

content: BRASILIA  April 8 Brazil's state-run oil producer Petroleo Brasileiro SA on Friday said it extended exclusive talks with Argentina's Pampa Energia SA for 30 days for the potential sale of a majority stake in Petrobras Argentina SA.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Brazil's Petrobras says extended talks with Argentina's Pampa

content: BUENOS AIRES  March 9 (IFR) - Argentine power company Pampa Energia could emerge soon with a bond deal to help fund the acquisition of assets from Brazilian oil company Petrobras  a Pampa official told IFR.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Pampa Energia mulls bond for Petrobras unit

content: BUENOS AIRES/RIO DE JANEIRO  March 2 Argentina's Pampa Energia SA offered Brazilian state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA about $1.2 billion to buy its 67.2 percent stake in Petrobras Argentina SA  a source with direct knowledge of the bid said on Wednesday.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: UPDATE 2-Pampa offers Petrobras about $1.2 bln for its Argentine unit

content: NEW YORK  Jan 26 (IFR) - Pampa Energia's shareholders have approved a US$500m debt program  raising speculation that the Argentine utility is accumulating a war chest for an acquisition of Petrobras assets.
name: Pampa Energia SA
title: Pampa Energia debt shelf sparks M&A talk
